com.iota.iri.storage.localinmemorygraph

Class LocalInMemoryGraphProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iota.iri.storage.localinmemorygraph.LocalInMemoryGraphProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceProvider, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LocalInMemoryGraphProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, PersistenceProvider
    Dag 内存模型处理类：提供存储/检索/构建dag全拓扑序功能 注：所有的输入均统称为交易，证实消息可以成为证实交易

    • Field Summary
